name: Escape From Polaris
description:
Escape From Polaris is my take on the classic "Galaxians", following its arcade style of gameplay and art. Endless game with Highscores to beat, 3 unique power-ups to use and 3 unique enemies to face against.
I posted my Highscore on there under the name "NIKO", so have fun and let me know what's your high-score.

---NAVIGATION IN MENUS---
 WS : Up, Down
SPACE : Select
ESC : Go back
